BASIC_OPTION.name: Basic Quiz
BASIC_OPTION.optionText: Quick and easy career guidance! Answer a few straight forward questions to receive personalized insights without the deep dive.

DETAILED_OPTION.name: Detailed Quiz
DETAILED_OPTION.optionText: Explore your career path in depth. Thoughtful questions will help you discover options and recommendations tailored to you.

CUSTOM_OPTION.name: Create-Your-Own Quiz
CUSTOM_OPTION.optionText: Already have an idea what you want to do? We can help with that too! Input your preferences and we'll tailor a quiz for you!
